scripts.local:create:silent: dotenv -- cross-var graph create $SUBGRAPH_NAME --node http://$LOCAL_GRAPH_NODE_API || true
scripts.local:setup: dotenv -- cross-var wait-on http-get://$LOCAL_GRAPH_NODE_GRAPHQL && npm run local:create:silent
scripts.local:redeploy: dotenv -- graph codegen && dotenv -- cross-var wait-on $LOCAL_IPFS_URL/api/v0/version http-get://$LOCAL_GRAPH_NODE_GRAPHQL && npm run local:redeploy:1
scripts.mainnet:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN $SUBGRAPH_NAME --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.staging:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN $SUBGRAPH_NAME --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.kovan:redeploy: dotenv -- cross-var graph deploy --access-token $THEGRAPH_TOKEN $SUBGRAPH_NAME --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
